ScheduledReports.AggregateReportsFormat_TablesAndGraphs: Display Report tables and Graphs for all reports
ScheduledReports.AggregateReportsFormat_TablesOnly: (default) Display Report tables (Graphs only for key metrics)
ScheduledReports.AlsoSendReportToTheseEmails: Also send the report to these emails (one email per line):
ScheduledReports.AreYouSureDeleteReport: Are you sure you want to delete this report and its schedule?
ScheduledReports.CancelAndReturnToReports: Cancel and %sreturn to the list of reports%s
ScheduledReports.DescriptionOnFirstPage: The report description will be displayed on the first page of the report.
ScheduledReports.EvolutionGraph: Show Historical Graphs for the top %s values
ScheduledReports.MonthlyScheduleHelp: Monthly schedule: report will be sent the first day of each month.
ScheduledReports.MustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to create and schedule custom reports.
ScheduledReports.PleaseFindAttachedFile: Please find in attached file your %1$s report for %2$s.
ScheduledReports.PleaseFindBelow: Please find below your %1$s report for %2$s.
ScheduledReports.PluginDescription: Create custom reports and schedule them to be emailed daily, weekly or monthly to one or several people. Several report formats are supported (html, pdf, csv, images).
ScheduledReports.ReportIncludeNWebsites: The report will include main metrics for all websites that have at least one visit (from the %s websites currently available).
ScheduledReports.Segment_Deletion_Error: This segment cannot be deleted or made invisible to other users because it is used to generate email report(s) %s. Please retry after removing this segment from this report(s).
ScheduledReports.Segment_Help: You can select an existing custom segment to apply to data in this email report. You may create and edit custom segments in your dashboard %s(click here to open)%s, then click on the "%s" box, then "%s".
ScheduledReports.SegmentAppliedToReports: The segment '%s' is applied to the reports.
ScheduledReports.ThereIsNoReportToManage: There is no report to manage for website %s
ScheduledReports.TopLinkTooltip: Create Email Reports to get Piwik stats delivered to your email or your customers' address automatically!
ScheduledReports.WeeklyScheduleHelp: Weekly schedule: report will be sent on Monday of each week.
